website_summaries.verdict: Five different pliers in the set provide an excellent value with comfortable and thick grips on the handles.
pros: Metal used in the construction of the pliers resists rust
Popular collection of different pliers, allowing you to complete a variety of jobs around the home
Brightly colored grips on the pliers makes it easy to find them
Thick grips are comfortable to use
Good quality construction, especially considering the price you'll pay
cons: Small tools that will not work for bigger jobs
Questionable quality that may not last over time

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure these are counterfeit. I ordered a "Homeowners" kit that came a few days later. It is a completely different green and these are missing the embossed logo on the rubber part of the handles like the tools that showed up in the kit. The rubber is noticeably different as well.
customer_reviews.author: Muktesh Desai

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman?
customer_reviews.text: These aren't Craftsman as you know Craftsman. I'm sure there is a market for this type of tool however if you are thinking that you are buying Craftsman quality when you select these, and know what to expect from Craftsman, then you will be disappointed. I originally scored this a 1 however they seem to be better than some brands out there. Spend the extra money and get the original Craftsman while they are still pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: The steel is kind of soft compared to other tools ...
customer_reviews.text: The steel is kind of soft compared to other tools I've used (channellock, proto, etc), small indent knick on the jaws from gripping metal. Do they work? absolutely they do. These are NOT the old school craftsman tool quality from years back, those days are long gone. It is what it is.........Standard cheap china tools. For me its just something inexpensive for a mobile junkyard tool kit. If the tools get lost or stolen, not a big loss. WOULD I BUY AGAIN.....maybe....if I need to build another inexpensive mobile/junkyard tool kit. EDIT - dang price went up from 19.99 to 26.99.......other better options at that price point.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald C.

customer_reviews.title: Almost impossible to remove from packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as spares to my truck toolbox. Nothing beats the Channel-Locks but in case I leave these behind or they get stolen...no big deal. Anyways, my rant is with the plastic packaging. Who are they trying to keep out?!?!? Did they not realize these are "cheap" tools and that is does not need the Ft. Knox security they have imposed? I have had kids' Christmas toys that were easier to open than these! Seriously, it took me about a solid 9 minutes of my lunch break to get them opened. When I finally got them all out, all of them feel solid except for the groove-joint "water pump" pliers. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Nicely built
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much from this set because of the reasonable price. But they have performed very well for this limited ability DYI guy. Handles are very nice, no flex in the metal when cutting something hard or griping a broken nail head and removing it. I like that I can use a sharpy to put my initials on them and its permanent. lots of tool borrowing and sharing in my garage, so everything gets my initials and there is no confusion at the end of a project.
customer_reviews.author: GHK

customer_reviews.title: They feel and look nice, but started rusting right away - not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Most of the tools felt good to use, except the larger groove-joint pliers, which feel very clunky to use. The jaws don't line up well when gripping a larger nut or bolt head. The lineman's pliers were completely covered in rust within about a month and the same was starting to happen with one of the other tools. This "Evolv" line from Craftsman is not a serious set of tools that I would recommend to any serious tinkerer/handyman or professional mechanic. I do NOT recommend this set (or brand). I'm returning these and getting a set of Gear Wrench pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Kam G.

customer_reviews.title: Packaging  From Hell
customer_reviews.text: I just received these and so I cannot comment on durability. To my eye, these pliers look really high-quality. But I did want to comment on the packaging. This packaging is a major bloody injury waiting to happen. It took me at least 20 minutes to get these things out of the packaging, and I’m amazed I didn’t cut my finger off with the sharp jagged plastic. Remember when Amazon emphasized that they had friendly packaging? They obviously haven’t gotten to this product yet. It’s ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Tome Raider

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but good
customer_reviews.text: This products costs like $5 a piece here. If you're not doing constantly very heavy duty work this set will do. If you doing hardcore mechanical work everyday you should look elsewhere. The feel isn't as good as the Irwin products. If you want the quality and durability I suggest you go Irwin. I use this in my job as a technician and it works fine because I don't need all these piece everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Driver

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after 3 months out of its packaging
customer_reviews.text: They are already rusted after 3 months out of their packaging. I’m very surprised and disappointed that they’re branded as Craftsman yet they rusted so easily without even any use.
customer_reviews.author: JCabrera

customer_reviews.title: Okay pliers for small home jobs
customer_reviews.text: Bought these pliers to bolster some of my misplaced pliers in my tool box. Was pretty disappointed to the size of these pliers. Much smaller than I expected and very stiff. They are definitely not going to be any use to me professionally but might come in handy as spares around the house. The dikes are actually pretty sharp and strong. For the price can't really complain - if you're an Auto tech don't expect these to be very useful in the field
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set for around the house repairs and DIY projects. I like the grips and they appear to be of decent quality, especially for the price. Haven't owned or used them enough to speak to durability. The only reason I gave a an over all 4 rating was to highlight the fact these are not of the quality the Craftsman name was once known for, as others have stated .. you get what you pay form
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice hand set of tools!
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed set of full-size nips and pliers for a fair price. I like that they are a perfect color match for all of my Ryobi power tools. The tools are built tight and the ends meet as they should, with no space in between. The linesman tool is excellent and I used it just this afternoon. Came well-shipped from the supplier in its original packaging. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Take a Hard Pass on These
customer_reviews.text: These pliers are rough-finished: the finish is not the matte polish of most Craftsman products. They jaws of most of the pliers don’t open readily: opening them is a two handed job. The packaging is thick clamshell: you have to cut and fight to get the pliers out. The only good thing about these pliers is that they are cheap. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: RJGatorEsq.

customer_reviews.title: Tools come rusted
customer_reviews.text: Pulled the tools out and they look like this. Completely rusted and the box is soaked in oil
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: men need tools
customer_reviews.text: after losing my beloved toolbox *( sad story insert here) I'm slowly rebuilding my tool inventory. This was first purchase & used them several times on projects & motorcycle service. luv these , each one helps me accomplish stuff , life is better.
customer_reviews.author: stinky

customer_reviews.title: Great feel, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I looked at different brands of tools, cheap tools, affordable tools, expensive tools. I settled on Craftsman because it is a quality tool at an affordable price, a brand that I am familiar with and the only drawback my Craftsman tools have ever had is that people that borrow them seem to never return them. I love my Craftsman tools and this set is not only great quality but are comfortable to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Guevara

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it would still be a bargain at twice the price.
customer_reviews.text: These tools seem as though they were made perfectly for my hands. I can not seem to put them down as I keep finding things I can do myself now. And forget about losing any, I can see right where they are. But I like the quality, as much as anything else, a sure grip every time.
customer_reviews.author: MarcusIII

customer_reviews.title: I've replaced what was taken from me.
customer_reviews.text: I'm hoping these tools will allow me to complete the indoor and outside projects. I'm going to be able to cut wiring for electricity. Being a person that was never trained, I hope some one in my area will step in it I am not using safe or logical moved.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gault

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Horrible there already rusted when I got them there pieces of junk I figured for the price it was ok but no don't buy this product you'll regret it
customer_reviews.author: Cory c

customer_reviews.title: Great value at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: For the money, you can't do better. The quality is acceptable. The edges are a bit sharp but nothing light sanding won't fix. Over all the tools are very good. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality but a few issues...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Just a little disappointed that out of the box there was some rust at some pivot points, and the fact that for the high price this set is made in China. Otherwise it seems to be a well made set to pliers / wrenches and I will update over time to see if they hold up as Craftsman tools are supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Maker Mac

customer_reviews.title: Nice Comfortable Pliers
customer_reviews.text: Nice strong pliers I need for my jewelry and craft business. I deducted a star because I needed a razor blade to cut out each and every too that was packed might in molded plastic. This wasn't a case of just cutting a slice open at the top and pulling everything out. The plastic was completely and stiffly wrapped the curved handles. No fun!
customer_reviews.author: Rescue Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great tools; bad packaging.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice sturdy tools (seem a little smaller than normal though). The only bad part is getting them out of the plastic package. It doesn't snap open or anything. You need strong scissors to cut off the top, then strong hands to pull it open. Whew! You get a lot of pliers for the money. And Craftsman is a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: D. Heff

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product as I expect from craftsmen. Got a great price for them. Have had no issues with these. They are well maintained but do take some abuse and they have handled it well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kreshalk

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Nephew
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my nephew. Since he was 10, I have bought tools every year for him at Christmas. Next year he'll be a senior and it will be my last year buying Christmas gifts for him. (I stopped buying for all nieces and nephews when they graduate from high school.) Wonderful addition to his collection.
customer_reviews.author: havingfun

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made & Breaks Easily - Save you money and shop somewhere else.
customer_reviews.text: You can not return the item. save your money and shop somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Long time shopper

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen drawer
customer_reviews.text: If you are a prof. auto mechanic you will laugh at these. However they are great to have in the junk drawer and used for household tasks. Why pay twice as much if these will do ?
customer_reviews.author: SamCorgi

customer_reviews.title: Nice plier set, handles are smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Nice plier set for the price. The handles are a little small. Good for tight spaces? It would be nice if sellers posted an image of their product with a ruler to better represent product size. Doesn’t seem important for something like pliers but for someone who uses these tools on a regular basis it can make a big difference in use-ability and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Nice pliers/cutter set
customer_reviews.text: There's not much to say about this set. They seem to be constructed well and are finished with nice, rubber grips. The machining is excellent. There probably is cheaper sets available that don't have the craftsman name, though.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hadden

customer_reviews.title: I found out "Evolv" means mediocre.
customer_reviews.text: For the money this set isn't bad but it sure as hell isn't Craftsman. The handles are pretty small and the jaw openings don't have a real big spread. For a set to use around the house for small jobs this is a very good set for the money invested.
customer_reviews.author: DiamondDandy

customer_reviews.title: Built right/Priced right
customer_reviews.text: During the process of reorganizing and upgrading my workshop I wanted a complete set of quality pliers and these really fit the bill. I bought the vise grip style and this set. Craftsman is hard to beat and this set is no exception. They look great and work great.
customer_reviews.author: stltx

customer_reviews.title: fair to midland
customer_reviews.text: overall I am satisfied with these but be aware that they are fairly small. almost toy size and I was surprised at that. They really need to add dimensions of each tool in the description. I was putting together a small toolset for an old truck I had so they should be fine for what I wanted. They would also be great to keep around the house for small repairs however I would not recommend these for a mechanics tool set as I would want more leverage on my regular tools.
customer_reviews.author: paul baeckel

customer_reviews.title: Great value and a great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty set for an extremely reasonable price. I'm very happy with my purchase, I ended up using them almost immediately. The right tool makes doing a job that much easier and I'm glad I have these to take the workload off.
customer_reviews.author: Quincy G. Riddick

customer_reviews.title: He did say they were a bit small for his job but that they're great for anything else
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these everyday! He did say they were a bit small for his job but that they're great for anything else. They have a very comfortable grip, and being craftsman, they're very trust worthy. He's had them for a while now and has had to replace other tools, but these have stood up to him. They really stand the strands of time and the HVAC buisness
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: best tools for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have used Craftsman tool since I was a kid and the have always performed perfect and if they ever broke they were replaced free without question
customer_reviews.author: Chris69

customer_reviews.title: I suggest getting a longer set. Not enough leverage.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the quality you would expect from craftsman. My only complaint is that they are a little short to get much leverage to cut anything more than soft rod buster wire. I suggest getting a longer set.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce X

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality, come packaged together and secured on a thick piece of cardboard-like material. I love the neon green grips as well. I got these for my boyfriend as an early Christmas present as he could use some decent new tools- I think he’ll love them! It’s definitely a high-quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Macy Deel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this set! The packaging was difficult to open and I had to use a razor knife to which dulled the blade. However, that aside, I do like the variety and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So long to the good ole days
customer_reviews.text: Made in China? Guess this isn't the Craftsman I grew up with. They are just okay but I am not thinking they will last as long as the "old Craftsman" will. Wire cutters dull out of the box (or should I say frustration packaging)
customer_reviews.author: gerri jay

customer_reviews.title: Good set of inexpensive pliers for different repair work around ...
customer_reviews.text: Good set of inexpensive pliers for different repair work around the house. If you use them frequently, you may want some that a longer for increased leverage, but these are by no means tiny. The channel-lock pliers may also be a bit small for some plumbing jobs, though they can grab a 1/2 or 3/4 inch hose fitting fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mohan S.

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Good wrenches for household use and a Great value. Originally I purchased this set for 1 wrench, but I ended up using 3 of them by the end of the month. It helps to have the right tools for the jobs.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Good tool, Great merchant.  Highly satisfied.  Good tools.
customer_reviews.text: Great merchant. Highly satisfied. Good tools. Reported a problem by accident (wrong merchant) and they were very supportive. Far better service than the merchant who actually had the issue. Good tool, a bit small, but great merchant.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Peterson

customer_reviews.title: tools
customer_reviews.text: I Liked it all. They handle well and work great. My merchandise came on time and was packaged good. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jessie B. Wright

customer_reviews.title: High quality tool
customer_reviews.text: Im a sheet metal worker and I use them every day at work
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rego

customer_reviews.title: Good set, supplement with larger Channel Locks
customer_reviews.text: These, as a set, are solid pliers. The adjustable jaw pliers aren't big enough to be of much use for what I need, however they do grip well whatever is in the jaws.
customer_reviews.author: hotaweager

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: Washed these tools in my dishwasher. After one wash, they were covered in rust. Expected way more from Craftsman branded tools.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: fantastic product!!!....This sellers items will make your wildest dreams come true
customer_reviews.author: martin janca

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good set
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good little set of pliers. Seems durable and fits good in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Good grip! Heavy duty feel. I received them as a gift and totally love them.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Graham

customer_reviews.title: Economical & Durable, Slightly Less Ergonomical
customer_reviews.text: For the price these pliers are worth it. The only issue is the ergonomics of them. I have larger fingers and my knuckles bump into one another on one pair of these pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: Looks heavy duty, didn’t need a whole huge toolkit for someone without a garage! Just for occasional use in apartment.
customer_reviews.author: LeeBee

customer_reviews.title: I Love this Craftsman set!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! Very durable and they work great! The price is god and sometimes you can even find them for less. They have already fulfilled many needs for me and my customers, dozens of whom have received this set from me! They come in handy for a myriad of uses and make a great, yet inexpensive gift!
customer_reviews.author: T CAMPBELL

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great value and excellent hand tools. For the money you won't do better.
customer_reviews.author: FloodMan

customer_reviews.title: Just what my husband needed!
customer_reviews.text: He liked the tools very much. Now he has a bit of a variety when he needs something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Orsola

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fantastic Craftsman quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright green handles making it easy to hold and find.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Perez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was everything I expected and I would purchase it again
customer_reviews.author: Gary Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of pliers
customer_reviews.text: These are well made. i use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Altemose

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then expected
customer_reviews.text: Good for small around the house jobs not to good for trade work
customer_reviews.author: brock

customer_reviews.title: Great set !
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at how nice this set is for the low price. Ignore any negatives on this and get them.
customer_reviews.author: woodman

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman Evolv 5
customer_reviews.text: Made in China but they feel and work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hipps

customer_reviews.title: Dirty in the box
customer_reviews.text: Again I ordered all 3 sets of these evolv tools ,the pliers, the wrench, the vise all super dirty but at least they're tools ya know
customer_reviews.author: Jakob Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great set of working tools
customer_reviews.text: They are just want I needed and the unusual color makes mine easy to spot when someone borrows one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: It's labeled as Craftsman, but....
customer_reviews.text: They are labeled as Craftsman, but they don't seem like the normal Craftsman quality. The grips do feel nice though. These are made in China, if that is important to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace my 5 disparate similar tools, and I love em. The grip is great, the price was right, and they look cool. Easy to store and get the job done, A+.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F. Paterniti

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: I love Craftsman Tools and will order again from this supplier now that my Sears is closed for business.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Stroshine

customer_reviews.title: Great for a new home owner.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a new home owner and these were a great addition to my growing tool box. I use them intermittently and they’re holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pliers set, some didn't seem too necessary though. At least the quality is good!
customer_reviews.author: Harry Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great price, and quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for building a homeowners toolkit. The process and quality are great for slowly building a quality selection
customer_reviews.author: Jason C

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman quality! The packaging was outrageous, though, ...
customer_reviews.text: Craftsman quality! The packaging was outrageous, though, and it took quite some time just to retrieve the pliers from the package.
customer_reviews.author: Cici Ciconia

customer_reviews.title: Quality is acceptable for around the house jobs - but ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality is acceptable for around the house jobs - but a bit light for a mechanic's toolbox. One grip was probably not up to quality control standards, but they operated acceptably. Price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing great about them. I probably will throw these out in a year or two and replace them with something nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Quality Craftsman product.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with craftsman. Only complaint it was hard to get out of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: LVKevin

customer_reviews.title: Rusty in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed from Craftsman, all got rusty in two weeks. Don't waste your money here.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Used is not new
customer_reviews.text: Tools don't seem bad but I was shipped used tools. Handles are dirty and covered with grease. There is wear on the jaws of two of the pieces. If I pay for a new item I expect to get a new item.
customer_reviews.author: asiL

customer_reviews.title: No problems here !!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son who is starting to obtain tools for car repairs. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Nuccio

customer_reviews.title: Quality toola
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great except I had a small chip on the inside of my pliers as if been used
customer_reviews.author: Andrew bowmab

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set and you won't be ashamed to have a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set and you won't be ashamed to have a buddy use them out of your Craftsman tool boxes full of Craftsman tools. I do not hesitate in the least in recommending this set of pliers. Just what you need in a home or small shop. The seller sent them promptly in their plastic Craftsman packaging. I recommend this seller, as well.
customer_reviews.author: idahojohn1

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool set
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice tool set. Seems to be good quality
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Momjian

customer_reviews.title: Part of my son’s evolving tool set. He’s learning ...
customer_reviews.text: Part of my son’s evolving tool set. He’s learning to manipulate the world around him to make things work.
customer_reviews.author: ToGo1919

customer_reviews.title: Yes, they do look nice!
customer_reviews.text: I like them, they are in my big tool kit! The do work well enough for me!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: this will make a nice addition to my toolbox and sufficient for household use
customer_reviews.text: bulkier than i was expecting. this will make a nice addition to my toolbox and sufficient for household use. if i were using them everyday for work or hobby, i might think they are too bulky with the thick, comfortable rubber grip.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Tilley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set great price. Donated to my Wood Shop group. They love it
customer_reviews.author: Lenora Osborne

customer_reviews.title: craftsman quality
customer_reviews.text: the tools are really durable and quality made.had hard time removing them from the plastic container., other wise I am really Happy with the set
customer_reviews.author: William E

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Can not go wrong with Craftsman tools. Would have been a 5 star if the grip color was different and it came with a self adjusting gripper tool that they also sell. Should swap out the wire cutters for that option. Duplication of tools vs. better option. Good tools for a fair price and lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Tubbs

customer_reviews.title: they are sturdy and cut well
customer_reviews.text: bought for my daughters tool set. She loves them. they are sturdy and cut well. She got tired of fighting with my old pliers and wire cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Insert Name

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of pliers. They work well and are not too loose or too tight when using. Only thing that confused me was they were sent taped up in a bubble rap bag as if someone bought them opened the packaging and threw them in the bubble rap bag to send off to someone. Even with that though they are brand new never been used so no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Cheesey set of tools
customer_reviews.text: Cheesey set of tools. Nor what I consider Craftman quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then they look in picture
customer_reviews.text: 1st thing I noticed was they are smAller then avarage tools, which means less leverage and weaker grip. The packaging was soo hard to open, took me 10 mins or so to get all tools out of it. Tools are okay quality but still 3 stars for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Sansinra

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Item is exactly as described and was shipped very fast!
customer_reviews.author: RONALD ALLEN

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Quality not that good. Couple months of use and showing some rust
customer_reviews.author: jose.g.orozco@outlook.com

customer_reviews.title: Great tools
customer_reviews.text: Craftsman tools are among the best and most come with a lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jan W

customer_reviews.title: Pleasure tomuse
customer_reviews.text: I like he feel of this pliers set. I'm not a mechanic and don't use tools every day, but I like the feel of these in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: George Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfort and quality
customer_reviews.text: Just a little smaller than expected, but great quality and very handy to have in tool bin.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: Great 5 piece set
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for this well made set. No issues to report. All the tools work as they should.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for.Easy to open and close and small enough for a woman to use
customer_reviews.author: Gerroline J. Terry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I thought. But they are exactly what they say they are in there description.
customer_reviews.author: Cody R.

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what expected
customer_reviews.text: Kept in the toolbox in the truck Few weeks later all rusty

product_meta.title: Craftsman Evolv 5 Piece Pliers Set, 9-10047
product_meta.description: One Set Suits a Variety of Projects The Craftsman EVOLV 5-Piece Pliers Set gives you the right-sized tool when you need it, so you don't lose valuable work time. The set includes 6-inch diagonal pliers, 6-inch long nosed pliers, 7-inch lineman's pliers, 6-inch slip joint pliers and 8-inch groove joint pliers. Engineered with quality, these pliers are tough enough to do all kinds of jobs.
feature_bullets: Craftsman EVOLV 5 pc. green plier set provides the right-sized tool for the job
The set includes a 6" diagonal pliers, 6" long nosed pliers, 7" lineman pliers, 6" slip joint pliers, and 8" groove joint pliers
Ergonomically engineered handle for comfortable grip when cutting, bending, and gripping with these pliers
Bright green coloring makes the pliers easy to spot on a workbench or in a toolbox
